          <title>
            <string language="en">Model of the Universe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Modell des Universums</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Modèle de l'univers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Modelo do universo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Modello dell'universo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μοντέλο του κόσμου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Modelo del universo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows an old model of the Universe where the planets, moon, star and Sun were thought to revolve around the Earth.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">jupiter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mars</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mercury</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">moon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">planets</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">saturn</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">universe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">venus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">stars</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt ein altes Modell des 
Universums, in dem die Planeten, der Mond, der Stern und die Sonne 
gedacht wurden, um um die Masse zu rotieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre un vieux modèle de 
l'univers où les planètes, lune, tiennent le premier rôle et le soleil ont 
été pensés pour tourner autour de la terre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra um modelo velho do 
universo onde os planetas, a lua, a estrela e o sol foram pensados 
para revolver em torno da terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un vecchio modello 
dell'universo in cui i pianeti, la luna, la stella ed il sole si sono 
pensati per girare intorno alla terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει παλαιό μοντέλο του 
κόσμου όπου οι πλανήτες, το φεγγάρι, το αστέρι και ο ήλιος 
θεωρήθηκαν για να περιστραφούν γύρω από τη γη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra un viejo modelo del 
universo donde los planetas, la luna, la estrella y el sol fueron 
pensados para girar alrededor de la tierra.</string>
          </description>
